Generated Narrative: ValueSet allergy-intolerance-substances-eu-hdr

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 105590001 (Substance)
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 373873005 (Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 420134006 (Propensity to adverse reactions)

name: AllergyIntoleranceSubstancesHdrVS
title: Allergy Intolerance
description: Allergy intolerance substances value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 373873005 \|Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product)\|; all descendants of 105590001 \|Substance (substance)\|; all descendants of 418038007 \|Propensity to adverse reactions to substance (finding)\|
